{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Mobile Communications Solution Tailored for Fleet Telematics |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = CalAmp_LMU-5531HP_Router_GPS |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = CalAmp |model = LMU-5531 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = HP |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 5 September 2021 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/CalAmp_LMU-5531HP_Router_GPS |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = GPS Tracker, wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = APV-55BTW, XPYLISAU200 |icid = 5843C-55BTW |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale (NXP);i.MX6S;MCIMX6S7CVM08AB; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 GHz --> |cpu2chip1 = STMicro;STM8S207;STM8S207RBT6; |cpu2_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu2_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS, --> |cpu2_type_rev = <!-- CPU2 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu2spd = 24 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SLC NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML04G100BHI00; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = STMicro;STM8S207;onchip; |flash2size = 128 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = 2 |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 6 KiB |ram2chip = STMicro;STM8S207;onchip; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Microchip;KSZ8794;KSZ8794CNX; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = 00:11:DB
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Mini PCIe |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9-28 |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_conn = Molex (4-pin)
|serial = yes,, DE-9,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.0 (BLE), GNSS, accelerometer, RTC, Li-ion battery |addchip = GNSS Module;u-blox;MAX-7C;;1;,,, I2C Real-time Clock;Pericom;PT7C4337;;1;,,, 3.5A 1MHz Boost Regulator;Micrel;MIC2253;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2514B;;1;,,, 14 Channel PMIC;Freescale (NXP);MMPF0100;;1;,,, RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MAX3221;;1;,,, Li-ion/Li Polymer Battery Charger;Renesas;ISL6292;;1;,,, 3.5-60V Input 2.5A Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS54260;;1;,,, 3.5-60V 2A Step-Down Voltage Converter;TI;LM46002;;1;,,, Current-Limited Power-Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2069;;2;,,, Octal Buffers/Drivers w/ 3-State Output;TI;SN74LVC541A;;1;,,, Single Chip USB to Dual UART Bridge;Silicon Labs;CP2105;;1;,,, 3.3-5V RS232/RS485/RS422 Serial Transceiver;Exar;SP336E;;1;,,, Micropower Quad CMOS Voltage Comparator;STMicro;TS339;;2;,,, 42V 3A Step-Down DC/DC Converter;AiT Semiconductor;A7431;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.50 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/19/2014 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA6234X; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = ublox LISA-U200 |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad2chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad2chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2stand = cellular
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|CalAmp LMU-5000}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[NXP]]'' i.MX6S ''Solo'' (MCIMX6S7CVM08AB) :@800MHz Single-core ARM (Cortex-A9) *Storage: 512MB (SLC NAND) Flash *Memory: 512MB (DDR3) SDRAM *WiFi: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6234X (802.11abgn) *Cellular: [[ublox LISA-U200]] (3.75G HSPA+) *Network: 2x Fast Ethernet ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0, 1x USB (OTG) ports *Power: 9-28V, via 4-pin molex
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.getwirelessllc.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/LMU-5531.pdf Datasheet]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
